question: According to Newton's first law of motion, an object at rest will remain at rest unless ____

choices.text: a force is applied to it

question: Newton's second law of motion states that the acceleration of an object is directly proportional to ____

choices.text: the net force acting on it.

question: Which of the following is an example of static friction?

choices.text: Sliding a book across a table.
Rolling a ball on the ground.
Pushing a heavy box and keeping it at rest.
Air resistance on a falling object.

choices.text: It is always equal to the weight of an object
It is a force that acts perpendicular to the rope

choices.text: opposite in direction to the gravitational force

question: Who formulated the three laws of motion?

choices.text: An object will accelerate when a force is applied.
An object in motion will come to rest without a force acting on it.

question: What is the law of conservation of momentum?

choices.text: The total momentum of an isolated system decreases over time.
The total momentum of an isolated system remains constant
